author: Jo' Pratt
method: Place all the ingredients in a small food processor or liquidizer and blitz until smooth. Serve chilled as a dip for poppadoms or as an accompaniment to curries.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz natural yoghurt,  small bunch fresh coriander,  1 green chilli, de-seeded and chopped,  squeeze of lime juice,  ½ tsp ground cumin,  good pinch of salt
